messages.message:
Very impressed with what I’m seeing so far. I’ve accomplished things in chat that would have taken days to build using our previous approaches.

Is it possible to run the chat output through a markdown or html processor? So that we could visually show a table in the output? Hopefully properly handling an html table would be a really quick change, that could level up the demos
Yup, noticed that too regarding the tables
Yes, it is one of the top features that we want to ship post the v0 launch

@Josh Heidebrecht, send GPT an example markdown document, then send your plain text document in and tell it to convert your doc to markdown using the first doc as a template.  @Abhishek Adupa has been doing this lately.
